47 
48 class PoseHandlerNode:
49  """
50  This class is an interface for manipulating object poses and converting them to robot poses.
51  In particular, it allows
52  - creation of workspaces
53  - created of grips
54  - convertion of workspace-relative poses (e.g. from camera) to robot poses
55  """
56 
57  def __init__(self):
58  rospy.logdebug("Poses Handlers - Entering in Init")
59 
60  # Subscribers
61  self.__tcp_enabled = False
62  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/tcp', TCP, self.__callback_tcp)
63 
64  self.__tool_id = 0
65  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot_tools_commander/current_id', Int32, self.__callback_tool_id)
66 
67  # Grips
68  tool_config_dict = rospy.get_param("niryo_robot_tools_commander/tool_list", dict())
69  self.__tool_id_gripname_dict = {
70  tool["id"]: "default_" + tool["name"].replace(" ", "_")
71  for tool in tool_config_dict
72  }
73  self.__tool_id_gripname_dict[-1] = "default_Calibration_Tip"
74 
75  grip_dir = rospy.get_param("~grip_dir")
76  self.__grip_manager = GripManager(grip_dir, self.__tool_id_gripname_dict.values())
77  rospy.Service('~get_target_pose', GetTargetPose, self.__callback_target_pose)
78 
79  # Transform Handlers
80  self.__transform_handler = PosesTransformHandler(self.__grip_manager, self)
81 
82  rospy.logdebug("Poses Handlers - Transform Handler created")
83 
84  # -- POSES
85  # Poses
86  poses_dir = rospy.get_param("~poses_dir")
87  self.__pos_manager = PoseManager(poses_dir)
88 
89  rospy.Service('~manage_pose', ManagePose, self.__callback_manage_pose)
90  rospy.Service('~get_pose', GetPose, self.__callback_get_pose)
91  rospy.Service('~get_pose_list', GetNameDescriptionList, self.__callback_get_pose_list)
92  self.__pose_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~pose_list', BasicObjectArray, latch=True, queue_size=10)
93  self.__publish_pose_list()
94 
95  # Dynamic Frame
96  self.__tf_listener = None
97  self.__tf_buffer = None
98  dynamic_frame_dir = rospy.get_param("~dynamic_frame_dir")
99  self.dynamic_frame_manager = DynamicFrameManager(dynamic_frame_dir)
100  rospy.Service('~manage_dynamic_frame', ManageDynamicFrame, self.__callback_manage_dynamic_frame)
101  rospy.Service('~get_dynamic_frame', GetDynamicFrame, self.__callback_get_dynamic_frame)
102  rospy.Service('~get_transform_pose', GetTransformPose, self.__callback_get_transform_pose)
103  rospy.Service('~get_dynamic_frame_list', GetNameDescriptionList, self.__callback_get_dynamic_frame_list)
104  self.__dynamic_frame_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~dynamic_frame_list',
105  BasicObjectArray,
106  queue_size=10,
107  latch=True)
108  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
109 
110  self.dynamic_frame_manager.restore_publisher()
111  self.dynamic_frame_manager.publish_frames()
112 
113  # Relative pose
114  self.__relative_pose_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~relative_pose', PoseStamped, queue_size=1)
115  self.__current_pose = [0] * 6
116  rospy.Subscriber('/niryo_robot/robot_state', RobotState, self.__robot_state_callback, queue_size=1)
117 
118  self.__relative_transform = None
119  rospy.Service('~set_relative_transform_frame', SetString, self.__callback_set_relative_transform_frame)
120  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration.from_sec(1 / 30), lambda _: self.__publish_relative_pose())
121 
122  # Workspaces
123  ws_dir = rospy.get_param("~workspace_dir")
124 
125  self.__ws_manager = WorkspaceManager(ws_dir)
126  rospy.Service('~manage_workspace', ManageWorkspace, self.__callback_manage_workspace)
127  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_ratio', GetWorkspaceRatio, self.__callback_workspace_ratio)
128  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_poses', GetWorkspaceRobotPoses, self.__callback_get_workspace_poses)
129  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_points', GetWorkspacePoints, self.__callback_get_workspace_points)
130  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_matrix_poses', GetWorkspaceMatrixPoses, self.__callback_get_workspace_matrix)
131  rospy.Service('~get_workspace_list', GetNameDescriptionList, self.__callback_get_workspace_list)
132  self.__workspace_list_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~workspace_list',
133  BasicObjectArray,
134  latch=True,
135  queue_size=10)
136  self.__publish_workspace_list()
137 
138  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
139  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
140 
141  rospy.loginfo("Poses Handlers - Started")
142 
143  # -- ROS CALLBACKS
144  def __callback_tcp(self, msg):
145  self.__tcp_enabled = msg.enabled
146 
147  def __callback_tool_id(self, msg):
148  self.__tool_id = msg.data
149 
150  # Workspace
151  def __callback_manage_workspace(self, req):
152  cmd = req.cmd
153  workspace = req.workspace
154  if len(workspace.name) > 30:
155  rospy.logwarn('Poses Handlers - Workspace name is too long, using : %s instead', workspace.name[:30])
156  workspace.name = workspace.name[:30]
157  if cmd == req.SAVE:
158  if len(workspace.poses) != 4:
159  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, "Workspaces have 4 positions, {} given".format(
160  len(workspace.poses))
161  try:
162  self.create_workspace(workspace.name, workspace.description, workspace.poses)
163  self.__publish_workspace_list()
164  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created workspace '{}'".format(workspace.name)
165  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
166  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
167  except Exception as e:
168  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
169 
170  elif cmd == req.SAVE_WITH_POINTS:
171  if len(workspace.points) != 4:
172  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, "Workspaces have 4 points, {} given".format(
173  len(workspace.points))
174  try:
175  self.create_workspace_from_points(workspace.name, workspace.description, workspace.points)
176  self.__publish_workspace_list()
177  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created workspace '{}'".format(workspace.name)
178  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
179  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
180  except Exception as e:
181  return CommandStatus.WORKSPACE_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
182  elif cmd == req.DELETE:
183  try:
184  self.remove_workspace(workspace.name)
185  self.__publish_workspace_list()
186  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed workspace '{}'".format(workspace.name)
187  except Exception as e:
188  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
189  else:
190  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "cmd '{}' not found.".format(req.cmd)
191 
192  def __callback_workspace_ratio(self, req):
193  try:
194  ratio = self.get_workspace_ratio(req.workspace)
195  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", ratio
196  except Exception as e:
197  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), 0
198 
199  def __callback_get_workspace_poses(self, req):
200  try:
201  poses = self.get_workspace_poses(req.name)
202  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", poses
203  except Exception as e:
204  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), 4 * [RobotState()]
205 
206  def __callback_get_workspace_points(self, req):
207  try:
208  points = self.get_workspace_points(req.name)
209  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", points
210  except Exception as e:
211  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), 4 * [Point()]
212 
213  def __callback_get_workspace_matrix(self, req):
214  try:
215  position_matrix, orientation_matrix = self.get_workspace_matrix_poses(req.name)
216  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", position_matrix, orientation_matrix
217  except Exception as e:
218  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), [], []
219 
220  def __callback_get_workspace_list(self, _):
221  return self.name_description_list_from_fun(self.get_available_workspaces)
222 
223  def __publish_workspace_list(self):
224  workspace_array = BasicObjectArray()
225  workspace_array.objects = [
226  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
227  description in zip(*self.get_available_workspaces())
228  ]
229  self.__workspace_list_publisher.publish(workspace_array)
230 
231  # Grips
232  def __callback_target_pose(self, req):
233  try:
234  pose = self.get_target_pose(req.workspace, req.height_offset, req.x_rel, req.y_rel, req.yaw_rel)
235  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", pose
236  except Exception as e:
237  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_COMPUTE_FAILURE, str(e), RobotState()
238 
239  # Position
240 
241  def __callback_get_pose(self, req):
242  try:
243  pos_msg = self.get_pose(req.name)
244  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", pos_msg
245  except Exception as e:
246  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), NiryoPose()
247 
248  def __callback_get_pose_list(self, _):
249  return self.name_description_list_from_fun(self.get_available_poses)
250 
251  def __callback_set_relative_transform_frame(self, req):
252  if req.value == '':
253  self.__relative_transform = None
254  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Disabled the relative transform'
255  elif req.value not in self.dynamic_frame_manager.get_all_names():
256  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_DOES_NOT_EXISTS, f'Dynamic frame "{req.value}" does not exists'
257 
258  try:
259  self.__relative_transform = self.get_transform(req.value, 'world')
260  except tf2_ros.LookupException as lookup_exception:
261  return CommandStatus.TF_ERROR, str(lookup_exception)
262  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, f'Successfully set relative transform frame to "{req.value}"'
263 
264  def __callback_manage_pose(self, req):
265  cmd = req.cmd
266  pose = req.pose
267  if cmd == req.SAVE:
268  try:
269  pose_version = pose.pose_version
270  pose_obj = PoseObj(name=pose.name,
271  description=pose.description,
272  joints=JointsPosition(*pose.joints),
273  pose=Pose(pose.position.x,
274  pose.position.y,
275  pose.position.z,
276  pose.rpy.roll,
277  pose.rpy.pitch,
278  pose.rpy.yaw,
279  metadata=PoseMetadata(pose_version)))
280  self.__pos_manager.create(pose_obj)
281  self.__publish_pose_list()
282  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created Position '{}'".format(pose.name)
283  except Exception as e:
284  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
285  elif cmd == req.DELETE:
286  try:
287  self.remove_pose(pose.name)
288  self.__publish_pose_list()
289  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed Position '{}'".format(pose.name)
290  except Exception as e:
291  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
292  else:
293  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "cmd '{}' not found.".format(cmd)
294 
295  # Dynamic Frame
296  def __callback_manage_dynamic_frame(self, req):
297  cmd = req.cmd
298  frame = req.dynamic_frame
299  frame.name = frame.name[:30]
300  if cmd == req.SAVE:
301  if len(frame.poses) != 3:
302  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_CREATION_FAILED, "Frame have 3 points, {} given".format(
303  len(frame.poses))
304  try:
305  self.create_dynamic_frame_from_poses(frame.name,
306  frame.description,
307  frame.poses,
308  frame.belong_to_workspace)
309  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
310  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
311  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
312  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
313  except (ValueError, Exception) as e:
314  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
315  if cmd == req.SAVE_WITH_POINTS:
316  if len(frame.points) != 3:
317  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_CREATION_FAILED, "Frame have 3 points, {} given".format(
318  len(frame.points))
319  try:
320  self.create_dynamic_frame_from_points(frame.name,
321  frame.description,
322  frame.points,
323  frame.belong_to_workspace)
324  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
325  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Created dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
326  except NiryoRobotFileException as e:
327  return CommandStatus.FILE_ALREADY_EXISTS, str(e)
328  except (ValueError, Exception) as e:
329  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_CREATION_FAILED, str(e)
330  elif cmd == req.DELETE:
331  if frame.belong_to_workspace:
332  return (CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED,
333  "Can't remove a dynamic frame which belong to a workspace")
334  try:
335  self.remove_dynamic_frame(frame.name, frame.belong_to_workspace)
336  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
337  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Removed dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
338  except Exception as e:
339  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_REMOVAL_FAILED, str(e)
340  elif cmd == req.EDIT:
341  if frame.belong_to_workspace:
342  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_EDIT_FAILED, "Can't edit a dynamic frame which belong to a workspace"
343  try:
344  if frame.description != '':
345  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_description(frame.name, frame.description)
346  if len(frame.points) == 3:
347  points_as_list = [(p.x, p.y, p.z) for p in frame.points]
348  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_points(frame.name, points_as_list)
349  if frame.rpy != RPY():
350  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_static_transform_w_rpy(frame.name, frame.position, frame.rpy)
351  if frame.orientation != Quaternion():
352  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_static_transform(frame.name, frame.position, frame.orientation)
353  if frame.new_name != '':
354  self.dynamic_frame_manager.edit_name(frame.name, frame.new_name)
355 
356  self.__publish_dynamic_frame_list()
357  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Edited dynamic frame '{}'".format(frame.name)
358  except Exception as e:
359  return CommandStatus.DYNAMIC_FRAME_EDIT_FAILED, str(e)
360  else:
361  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "cmd '{}' not found.".format(cmd)
362 
363  def __callback_get_dynamic_frame(self, req):
364  try:
365  dyn_frame = self.get_dynamic_frame(req.name)
366  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", dyn_frame
367  except Exception as e:
368  return CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE, str(e), None
369 
370  def __callback_get_transform_pose(self, req):
371  try:
372  pose = [req.position.x, req.position.y, req.position.z, req.rpy.roll, req.rpy.pitch, req.rpy.yaw]
373  transform_pose = self.transform_pose_from_frame(pose, req.source_frame, req.local_frame)
374  position = transform_pose.pose.position
375  rpy = self.quaternion_to_rpy(transform_pose.pose.orientation)
376  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Success", position, rpy
377 
378  except Exception as e:
379  rospy.logerr("Poses Handlers - Error occurred when getting transform: {}".format(e))
380  return CommandStatus.CONVERT_FAILED, str(e), Point(), RPY()
381 
382  def __callback_get_dynamic_frame_list(self, _):
383  return self.name_description_list_from_fun(self.get_available_dynamic_frame_w_description)
384 
385  def __publish_dynamic_frame_list(self):
386  dynamic_frame_array = BasicObjectArray()
387  dynamic_frame_array.objects = [
388  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
389  description in zip(*self.get_available_dynamic_frame_w_description())
390  ]
391  self.__dynamic_frame_list_publisher.publish(dynamic_frame_array)
392 
393  def __publish_pose_list(self):
394  pose_array = BasicObjectArray()
395  pose_array.objects = [
396  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name, description in zip(*self.get_available_poses())
397  ]
398  self.__pose_list_publisher.publish(pose_array)
399 
400  def __robot_state_callback(self, msg):
401  self.__current_pose = [msg.position.x, msg.position.y, msg.position.z, msg.rpy.roll, msg.rpy.pitch, msg.rpy.yaw]
402 
403  def __publish_relative_pose(self):
404  if self.__relative_transform is None:
405  return
406 
407  transform_pose = self.transform_pose(self.__relative_transform, self.__current_pose)
408  self.__relative_pose_publisher.publish(transform_pose)
409 
410  # -- REGULAR CLASS FUNCTIONS
411  # Workspace
412 
413  def create_workspace(self, name, description, robot_poses):
414  """
415  Creates a new workspace based on 4 recorded robot poses. The 0th point
416  needs to be the workspace origin. Points ordered clockwise.
417 
418  :param name: name of the new workspace
419  :param description: description of the new workspace
420  :param robot_poses: [pose when pointing at origin, pose on marker 1,...]
421  """
422  points = []
423  robot_poses_raw = []
424 
425  for pose in robot_poses:
426  rospy.logdebug("Robot point\n{}".format(pose.position))
427  point = self.__transform_handler.get_calibration_tip_position(pose)
428  rospy.logdebug("Tip point\n{}".format(point))
429  points.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
430  pose_obj = [[pose.position.x, pose.position.y, pose.position.z],
431  [pose.rpy.roll, pose.rpy.pitch, pose.rpy.yaw]]
432  robot_poses_raw.append(pose_obj)
433 
434  self.__ws_manager.create(name, points, robot_poses_raw, description)
435 
436  # Asssociate frame
437  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, [points[0]] + [points[3]] + [points[1]], description, True)
438 
439  def create_workspace_from_points(self, name, description, points):
440  """
441 
442  :param name: name of the new workspace
443  :param description: description of the new workspace
444  :param points: [pose of origin marker, pose of marker 1,...]
445  """
446  points_raw = []
447  for point in points:
448  points_raw.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
449  self.__ws_manager.create(name, points_raw, description)
450 
451  # Asssociate frame
452  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, [points_raw[0]] + [points_raw[3]] + [points_raw[1]], description, True)
453 
454  def remove_workspace(self, name):
455  """
456  Removes a workspace
457  :param name: name of the workspace to remove
458  """
459  self.__ws_manager.remove(name)
460 
461  self.dynamic_frame_manager.remove(name, True)
462 
463  def get_available_workspaces(self):
464  """
465  Returns a list of all available workspace names.
466  """
467  return self.__ws_manager.get_all_names_w_description()
468 
469  def get_workspace_poses(self, name):
470  ws_raw = self.__ws_manager.read(name)
471  poses = [RobotState(position=Point(*pose[0]), rpy=RPY(*pose[1])) for pose in ws_raw.robot_poses]
472  return poses
473 
474  def get_workspace_points(self, name):
475  ws_raw = self.__ws_manager.read(name)
476  points = [Point(*pose) for pose in ws_raw.points]
477  return points
478 
479  def get_workspace_matrix_poses(self, name):
480  """
481  Returns position and orientation matrix of a workspace
482  """
483  ws_raw = self.__ws_manager.read(name)
484 
485  position_raw = ws_raw.position_matrix.tolist()
486  orientation_raw = ws_raw.rotation_matrix.tolist()
487 
488  position_matrix = [Point(*pose) for pose in position_raw]
489  orientation_matrix = [Quaternion(*pose) for pose in orientation_raw]
490  return position_matrix, orientation_matrix
491 
492  def get_workspace_ratio(self, workspace):
493  """
494  Reads the ratio (width/height) of the specified workspace. This function is used by the
495  camera to do the perspective transform.
496 
497  :param workspace: name of the workspace
498  """
499  current_ws = self.__ws_manager.read(workspace)
500  return current_ws.x_width / current_ws.y_width
501 
502  # Grips
503  def get_target_pose(self, workspace, height_offset, x_rel, y_rel, yaw_rel):
504  """
505  Computes the robot pose that can be used to grab an object which is
506  positioned relative to the given workspace.
507 
508  :param workspace: name of the workspace the object is in
509  :param height_offset: z-offset that is added
510  :param x_rel: x relative position of the object inside working zone
511  :param y_rel: y relative position of the object inside working zone
512  :param yaw_rel: angle of the object inside working zone
513  """
514  current_ws = self.__ws_manager.read(workspace)
515  self.__transform_handler.set_relative_pose_object(current_ws,
516  x_rel,
517  y_rel,
518  yaw_rel,
519  yaw_center=current_ws.yaw_center)
520 
521  if self.__tcp_enabled:
522  base_link_to_tool_target = self.__transform_handler.get_object_transform(z_off=height_offset)
523  else:
524  current_grip = self.__grip_manager.read(self.__tool_id_gripname_dict[self.__tool_id])
525  current_grip.transform.transform.translation.z += height_offset
526  self.__transform_handler.set_grip(current_grip)
527  base_link_to_tool_target = self.__transform_handler.get_gripping_transform()
528 
529  q = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.rotation
530 
531  roll, pitch, yaw = euler_from_quaternion([q.x, q.y, q.z, q.w])
532 
533  pose = RobotState()
534  pose.position.x = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.translation.x
535  pose.position.y = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.translation.y
536  pose.position.z = base_link_to_tool_target.transform.translation.z
537  pose.rpy.roll = roll
538  pose.rpy.pitch = pitch
539  pose.rpy.yaw = yaw
540 
541  return pose
542 
543  # -- Pose
544 
545  def get_pose(self, name):
546  """
547  Get pose from pose manager and return NiryoPose
548 
549  :param name: pose name
550  :type name: str
551  :return: The pose object
552  :rtype: NiryoPose
553  """
554  pose_obj = self.__pos_manager.read(name)
555  pose = NiryoPose()
556  pose.name = pose_obj.name
557  pose.description = pose_obj.description
558  pose.joints = list(pose_obj.joints)
559  pose.position = Point(x=pose_obj.pose.x, y=pose_obj.pose.y, z=pose_obj.pose.z)
560  pose.rpy = RPY(roll=pose_obj.pose.roll, pitch=pose_obj.pose.pitch, yaw=pose_obj.pose.yaw)
561  rx, ry, rz, w = pose_obj.pose.quaternion()
562  pose.orientation = Quaternion(x=rx, y=ry, z=rz, w=w)
563  try:
564  pose.pose_version = pose_obj.pose.metadata.version
565  except Exception:
566  # pose_version doesn't exist assume it has legacy format
567  pose.pose_version = 0
568  return pose
569 
570  def remove_pose(self, name):
571  """
572  Asks pose manager to remove pose
573 
574  :param name: pose name
575  :type name: str
576  :return: None
577  """
578  self.__pos_manager.remove(name)
579 
580  def get_available_poses(self):
581  """
582  Ask the poses manager which pose(s) are available
583 
584  :return: list of positions name
585  :rtype: list[str]
586  """
587  return self.__pos_manager.get_all_names_w_description()
588 
589  # Dynamic frame
590  def create_dynamic_frame_from_poses(self, name, description, poses, belong_to_workspace=False):
591  """
592  Create a dynamic frame from ManageDynamicFrame message fields
593 
594  :param name: nom de la frame
595  :type name: str
596  :param description : description
597  :type description: str
598  :param poses: list of poses to create the frame
599  :type poses: niryo_robot_msgs/RobotState
600  :return: None
601  """
602  points = []
603 
604  for pose in poses:
605  rospy.logdebug("Robot point\n{}".format(pose.position))
606  point = self.__transform_handler.get_calibration_tip_position(pose)
607  rospy.logdebug("Tip point\n{}".format(point))
608  points.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
609 
610  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, points, description, belong_to_workspace)
611 
612  def create_dynamic_frame_from_points(self, name, description, points, belong_to_workspace=False):
613  """
614  Create a dynamic frame from ManageDynamicFrame message fields
615 
616  :param name: nom de la frame
617  :type name: str
618  :param description : description
619  :type description: str
620  :param points: list of points to create the frame
621  :type points: geometry_msg/Point
622  :return: None
623  """
624  points_raw = []
625  for point in points:
626  points_raw.append([point.x, point.y, point.z])
627 
628  self.dynamic_frame_manager.create(name, points_raw, description, belong_to_workspace)
629 
630  def remove_dynamic_frame(self, name, belong_to_workspace=False):
631  """
632  Asks dynamic frame manager to remove dynamic frame
633 
634  :param name: dynamic frame name
635  :type name: str
636  :param belong_to_workspace: whether the dynamic frame belong to a workspace or not
637  :type belong_to_workspace: bool
638  :return: None
639  """
640  self.dynamic_frame_manager.remove(name, belong_to_workspace)
641 
642  def get_dynamic_frame(self, name):
643  """
644  Get dynamic frame from dynamic frame manager and return pose of the frame
645 
646  :param name: pose name
647  :type name: str
648  :return: Pose of the dynamic frame object
649  :rtype: Pose
650  """
651  frame_read = self.dynamic_frame_manager.read(name)
652  pose_obj = frame_read.static_transform_stamped
653 
654  frame = DynamicFrame()
655  frame.name = frame_read.name
656  frame.description = frame_read.description
657  frame.belong_to_workspace = frame_read.belong_to_workspace
658  point = Point(*pose_obj[0])
659  quaternion = Quaternion(*pose_obj[1])
660  roll, pitch, yaw = euler_from_quaternion([quaternion.x, quaternion.y, quaternion.z, quaternion.w])
661  rpy = RPY(roll, pitch, yaw)
662 
663  frame.position = point
664  frame.orientation = quaternion
665  frame.rpy = rpy
666 
667  return frame
668 
669  def get_available_dynamic_frame_w_description(self):
670  """
671  Ask the dynamic frame manager which dynamic frame are available
672 
673  :return: list of dynamic frame name
674  :rtype: list[str]
675  """
676  return self.dynamic_frame_manager.get_all_names_w_description()
677 
678  def get_transform(self, source_frame, local_frame):
679  if self.__tf_buffer is None or self.__tf_listener is None:
680  self.__tf_buffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
681  self.__tf_listener = tf2_ros.TransformListener(self.__tf_buffer)
682 
683  # Get transform
684  transform = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform(source_frame, local_frame, rospy.Time(0), rospy.Duration(4))
685  return transform
686 
687  def transform_pose(self, transform, pose):
688  pose_stamped = tf2_geometry_msgs.PoseStamped()
689  pose_stamped.pose.position = Point(*pose[:3])
690  quaternion = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(*pose[3:])
691  pose_stamped.pose.orientation = Quaternion(*quaternion)
692  pose_stamped.header.frame_id = transform.child_frame_id
693  pose_stamped.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
694 
695  # Calculate pose in world frame
696  transform_pose = tf2_geometry_msgs.do_transform_pose(pose_stamped, transform)
697 
698  return transform_pose
699 
700  def transform_pose_from_frame(self, pose, source_frame, local_frame):
701  """
702  Get the transform pose in source_frame from local_frame
703 
704  :return: transform pose
705  :rtype : list[float]
706  """
707 
708  transform = self.get_transform(source_frame, local_frame)
709  return self.transform_pose(transform, pose)
710 
711  @staticmethod
712  def quaternion_to_rpy(quaternion):
713  euler = euler_from_quaternion([quaternion.x, quaternion.y, quaternion.z, quaternion.w])
714  return RPY(*euler)
715 
716  @staticmethod
717  def name_description_list_from_fun(fun):
718  response = GetNameDescriptionListResponse()
719  response.status = CommandStatus.SUCCESS
720 
721  try:
722  response.name_list, response.description_list = fun()
723  except Exception as e:
724  rospy.logerr("Poses Handlers - Error occured when getting list: {}".format(e))
725  response.status = CommandStatus.POSES_HANDLER_READ_FAILURE
726  response.message = str(e)
727 
728  response.objects = [
729  BasicObject(name=name, description=description) for name,
730  description in zip(response.name_list, response.description_list)
731  ]
732  return response
733 
734 
735 if __name__ == "__main__":
736  sentry_init()
737 
738  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_poses_handlers', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
739 
740  # change logger level according to node parameter
741  log_level = rospy.get_param("~log_level")
742  logger = logging.getLogger("rosout")
743  logger.setLevel(log_level)
744 
745  try:
746  vision_node = PoseHandlerNode()
747  rospy.spin()
748  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
749  pass
